entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 12:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Blowing snow before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
